allow: Bash(for dir in Akma crystal3d finalfantasy3d fishing "Hwarang''s Path" kingdomDefense mechWar monsterBattle pocketDragon smashLand zelda)
Bash(for f in studio.js file-preview.js test-runner.js game-view.js overlay.js main.js gamepad.js background.js games.js)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing

# Create 256x256 bitmap for high-quality icon
$bmp = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\(256, 256\)
$g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($bmp\)
$g.SmoothingMode = ''AntiAlias''
$g.Clear\([System.Drawing.Color]::Transparent\)

# Outer flame \(orange-red\)
$outerPoints = @\(
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(128, 10\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(75, 70\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(85, 50\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(50, 120\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(65, 100\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(35, 170\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(40, 210\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(55, 235\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(80, 248\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(128, 252\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(176, 248\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(201, 235\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(216, 210\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(221, 170\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(191, 100\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(206, 120\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(171, 50\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(181, 70\)
\)

# Gradient brush for outer flame
$outerBrush = New-Object System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush\($outerPoints\)
$outerBrush.CenterColor = [System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 200, 0\)
$outerBrush.SurroundColors = @\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 220, 50, 0\)\) * $outerPoints.Length

$g.FillClosedCurve\($outerBrush, $outerPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.4\)

# Middle flame \(bright orange\)
$midPoints = @\(
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(128, 50\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(90, 100\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(70, 160\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(65, 200\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(80, 230\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(110, 245\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(146, 245\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(176, 230\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(191, 200\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(186, 160\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(166, 100\)
\)

$midBrush = New-Object System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush\($midPoints\)
$midBrush.CenterColor = [System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 230, 50\)
$midBrush.SurroundColors = @\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 120, 0\)\) * $midPoints.Length

$g.FillClosedCurve\($midBrush, $midPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.4\)

# Inner flame \(yellow-white core\)
$innerPoints = @\(
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(128, 110\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(100, 160\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(90, 200\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(100, 230\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(128, 242\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(156, 230\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(166, 200\),
    [System.Drawing.PointF]::new\(156, 160\)
\)

$innerBrush = New-Object System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush\($innerPoints\)
$innerBrush.CenterColor = [System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 255, 200\)
$innerBrush.SurroundColors = @\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 200, 50\)\) * $innerPoints.Length

$g.FillClosedCurve\($innerBrush, $innerPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.5\)

# Save as ICO
$icoPath = ''Z:\\Development\\amatris\\amatris-fire.ico''

# Create ICO file manually \(ICO format\)
$ms = New-Object System.IO.MemoryStream
# Save as PNG first
$bmp.Save\($ms, [System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat]::Png\)
$pngBytes = $ms.ToArray\(\)
$ms.Dispose\(\)

# Build ICO file
$fs = [System.IO.File]::Create\($icoPath\)
$bw = New-Object System.IO.BinaryWriter\($fs\)

# ICO header
$bw.Write\([UInt16]0\)      # Reserved
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)      # Type: ICO
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)      # Number of images

# Image directory entry
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)        # Width \(0 = 256\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)        # Height \(0 = 256\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)        # Color palette
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)        # Reserved
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)      # Color planes
$bw.Write\([UInt16]32\)     # Bits per pixel
$bw.Write\([UInt32]$pngBytes.Length\)  # Image size
$bw.Write\([UInt32]22\)     # Offset \(6 header + 16 directory = 22\)

# Image data \(PNG\)
$bw.Write\($pngBytes\)

$bw.Flush\(\)
$fs.Close\(\)
$bmp.Dispose\(\)
$g.Dispose\(\)

Write-Host ''Icon created at'' $icoPath
")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing

$bmp = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\(256, 256\)
$g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($bmp\)
$g.SmoothingMode = ''AntiAlias''
$g.Clear\([System.Drawing.Color]::Transparent\)

# Dark red outer flame
$darkRed = New-Object System.Drawing.SolidBrush\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 180, 30, 0\)\)
$outerPoints = @\(
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 8\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(80, 65\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(90, 45\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(55, 115\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(68, 95\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(32, 175\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(38, 215\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(55, 238\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(85, 250\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 254\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(171, 250\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(201, 238\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(218, 215\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(224, 175\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(188, 95\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(201, 115\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(166, 45\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(176, 65\)\)
\)
$g.FillClosedCurve\($darkRed, $outerPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.35\)

# Bright orange middle flame
$orange = New-Object System.Drawing.SolidBrush\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 120, 0\)\)
$midPoints = @\(
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 45\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(92, 100\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(72, 160\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(68, 205\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(82, 232\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(112, 246\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(144, 246\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(174, 232\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(188, 205\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(184, 160\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(164, 100\)\)
\)
$g.FillClosedCurve\($orange, $midPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.4\)

# Yellow inner flame
$yellow = New-Object System.Drawing.SolidBrush\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 210, 30\)\)
$innerPoints = @\(
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 100\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(102, 155\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(92, 200\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(102, 232\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 244\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(154, 232\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(164, 200\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(154, 155\)\)
\)
$g.FillClosedCurve\($yellow, $innerPoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.45\)

# White-yellow hot core
$white = New-Object System.Drawing.SolidBrush\([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb\(255, 255, 250, 180\)\)
$corePoints = @\(
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 160\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(112, 200\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(115, 228\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(128, 238\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(141, 228\)\),
    \(New-Object System.Drawing.PointF\(144, 200\)\)
\)
$g.FillClosedCurve\($white, $corePoints, [System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode]::Winding, 0.5\)

# Save as proper ICO
$icoPath = ''Z:\\Development\\amatris\\amatris-fire.ico''

$ms = New-Object System.IO.MemoryStream
$bmp.Save\($ms, [System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat]::Png\)
$pngBytes = $ms.ToArray\(\)
$ms.Dispose\(\)

$fs = [System.IO.File]::Create\($icoPath\)
$bw = New-Object System.IO.BinaryWriter\($fs\)
$bw.Write\([UInt16]0\)
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)
$bw.Write\([byte]0\)
$bw.Write\([UInt16]1\)
$bw.Write\([UInt16]32\)
$bw.Write\([UInt32]$pngBytes.Length\)
$bw.Write\([UInt32]22\)
$bw.Write\($pngBytes\)
$bw.Flush\(\)
$fs.Close\(\)

$g.Dispose\(\)
$bmp.Dispose\(\)
$darkRed.Dispose\(\)
$orange.Dispose\(\)
$yellow.Dispose\(\)
$white.Dispose\(\)

Write-Host ''Fire icon created successfully:'' $icoPath
Write-Host ''Size:'' \(Get-Item $icoPath\).Length ''bytes''
")
